metadata.title: Go Gotchas, Tips, and Good Practices for Efficient Go
metadata.description: Review some of the common mistakes we make while writing Go code and learn how to avoid them along with good practices for efficient Go.

metadata.title: Advanced Go: Internals, Memory Model, Garbage Collection and Concurrency
metadata.description: Deep dive into the Go's Memory model, the internals of Go's data structures, Garbage collection and Concurrency model.
